mapper.select: SELECT b.siteId, a.userId, a.password, a.roles, a.sessionId, a.connectIp, to_char(a.connectDate,'YYYY年MM月DDer日') as connectDay, a.userCode, b.userName FROM t_login_info a, t_user_info b WHERE a.userCode = b.userCode AND a.userId = #{userid} AND a.deleteFlag = 'N' AND b.deleteFlag = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_login_info SET sessionId = #{sessionid}, connectIp = #{connectip}, connectdate = now() WHERE userId = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_login_hist (siteId, userId, roles, yearMonthDay, loginDiv, flagSuccess, sessionId, createDate) values (#{siteid}, #{userid}, #{roles}, to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD'),#{loginDiv},'Y',#{sessionid},now())
mapper.select: SELECT a.password, b.birthday FROM t_login_info a, t_user_info b WHERE a.userCode = b.userCode AND a.userId = #{userid} AND a.deleteFlag = 'N'
